alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:23AM CDT until April 09 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston and from Edwardsport to Petersburg. Wabash River at Hutsonville, Riverton, and Mount Carmel. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the Wabash and White Rivers, as well as Seymour on the East Fork White. With dry weather expected for several days, minor flooding is expected to end over the weekend for most locations, but continue into the middle of next week at Mount Carmel, and near the end of next week at Hazleton. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday /10:00 AM EDT Friday/ the stage was 17.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Friday /10:00 AM EDT Friday/ was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
